DataElement.preferredName: Quality-of-Life Assessment Patient Family Member Complete Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no indicator related to a member of the patient's family or fundamental unit of society assisting the person who requires medical care (patient) in finishing the evaluation of the quality of patient life and function assessment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Quality-of-Life Assessment Patient Family Member Complete
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to quality-of-life assessment being completed or given assistance by a member of the patient's family or fundamental unit of society.

Concepts.definition: A determination of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.:A member of the fundamental unit of society designed primarily to regulate sexual behavior and reproduce, nurture, protect, and socialize the youngs, traditionally organized around kinship ties, descend from the common progenitor or related by marriage or by a feeling of closeness; or of any of various social units differing from but regarded as equivalent to the traditional family.:Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Any of the individuals who are descended from a common progenitor, related by marriage or other legal tie, or by a feeling of closeness.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

DataElement.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Quality of Life Ind-2 2018322v1.0 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator   - dbw
